name: The Secret Diary of Acrians Locket (Magical Diaries)
name_original: The Secret Diary of Acrians Locket (Magical Diaries)
description:
The Secret Diary of Acrians Locket (ac-ron-z lock-et) is a public domain magical journal detailing the occult life and experiments of one Acrians Locket. This page includes the download and pdf files for parts of the book, for the entire full thing please see THIS BLOG, the journal get updated via size and length routinely, and is free of charge and copyright. That means translations, publications, illustrations or even the use of Acrians's stories in the journal for anything from a stage play to a manga may be used by you the reader.  Or what it's meant for, practical magickal instruction in the real world.

This journal is nonfiction! It is occult based! This journal is NSFW it includes, hexes, demons, rape, curses, and blasphemy (depends on the book). It is not for the faint of heart and while I don't believe it goes against itch.io's rules in any way, it is a dark book full of black magick. The book is best dealt with notes on hand, reading into things the author did not, and researching things the author did not at points of writing. Replicating some of the experiments presented as presented may lead to harm or injury so be very careful if you are not well versed or practiced.

The book's very in experience and quality!

Also! This is not the full journal. The entire thing can be found online here! With a tag system on that website, and a search bar.

Good luck and happy reading.  Oh yeah and the fuking guy didn't bother to spell check it motherfucker-

-Ebony Rain
